Author: DelicateBones
Text: For real. I’ve been working hard to not weigh myself frequently at home and the first thing I did  this morning was haul a heavy weighted object to my scale to ensure accuracy before stepping on to see my first thing in the morning, before eating, no clothes on weight.  Much more comforting than the number I saw yesterday, but I’m still in the middle of my period, so kicking off a poor body image day.

Author: shrinkingviolet85
Text: That really sucks :( I can only imagine the anxiety you must have had before they fixed their mistake. I always ask to do a blind weight when I go to the doctor too and they don't even care about giving me a form that doesn't say my weight on it, it's in bold on the first page every time. The worst part is that they weigh me in my clothes and shoes and don't even let me put my purse down, so it often reads up to 10 lbs higher than what I weighed at home. So triggering.
